metadata.scenario: Customer service interaction about a delayed package

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a package that's late. The tracking number is 9876543210.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing your tracking number. I'm looking into that for you now. Please hold.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, but it's been delayed for five days now, so I'm already pretty frustrated.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. According to the tracking information, the package was last scanned at our distribution center three days ago. There seems to be a delay due to unforeseen circumstances. We are working to resolve this as quickly as possible.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Unforeseen circumstances? What does that even mean? Can you tell me specifically what's causing the delay? Is it lost?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am unable to give you specific details about the cause of the delay, but the package is not marked as lost at this time. We are actively investigating. I can put in a request to have the local hub prioritize the delivery. Would you like me to do that?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, please. And, can you give me an estimate of when I might receive it? I really need this package by the end of the week.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I've submitted the request. While I can't provide an exact delivery date, I can tell you that once the package is scanned again, the tracking information should update with an estimated delivery date. I will also keep an eye on this and will follow up if it doesn't get scanned within the next 48 hours. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: No, that's all. Thank you for your help. Hopefully, I'll get it soon.
